fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
xSNX smart contract is no longer operational.

xSNX was a smart contract for SNX run by the protocol xToken. xSNX aimed to provide exposure to Synthetix staking incentives within the heavy cost of ongoing gas by pooling everyone together. It has been stopped, due to two exploits of the smart contract.

See the [xSNX post mortem blog post](https://medium.com/xtoken/xsnx-post-mortem-666d35071f38) for more information.
